meanings.definition: The act of automatically dialing a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: Autodialling can save time by dialing numbers automatically.
meanings.sent2: The autodialling feature on my phone makes calling friends easy.
meanings.sent3: I never knew autodialling could be so convenient until I tried it.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like an autodialling machine, effortlessly dialing each number.
meanings.sent5: The sound of autodialling echoed through the room, filling the air with electronic tones.

meanings.definition: A system or device that automatically dials telephone numbers.
meanings.sent1: Our office uses an autodialling system to reach customers quickly.
meanings.sent2: The autodialling device on the desk helps make calls efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The autodialling machine seemed to have a mind of its own, dialing numbers at random.
meanings.sent4: The autodialling system worked tirelessly, connecting calls without pause.
meanings.sent5: With the autodialling device, making calls became as easy as pressing a button.
